TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Sir, that's your finger.

Waiter, there's music in my soup! I don't even know how this is possible!

Quiet, it's Eminem!

Waiter, there's a minuteman III in my soup...AND DANNY2462 IS HEADED STRAIGHT FOR THE LAUNCH CONTROLS!!!!!!

OMG RUN BEFORE HE LAUNCHES IT! ZOMG HE LAUNCHED IT AND IT'S HEADED ST-

Waiter, there's a snail in my soup.

You ordered slow soup, I'll remove it for you but I'm moving so slow

Waiter, theres a nuclear engine in my soup

U said "ooh! the green glowing one!", sir.

Waiter, there's a turret sticking out of my soup.

It now has 75% more soup... per soup.

Waiter, vexx put a riddle in my soup!

Edited February 10, 2015 by Janos1986

Better solve it quick!

Waiter, James Brown is singing in my soup!

*BANG!*

Better now?

Waiter, there is a sword in my soup!

Well, you did ask for stone soup!

Waiter, there's an explosion in my soup!

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001

We were all out of swimming pools, so we've had to use your soup bowl to host the water-based events.

Waiter! My soup has me hostage!

Have a nice day!

Waiter, there's a CIH Virus in my soup.

I know. Because I put it there. (Dun Dun DUUUUUUUUUUUUN)

Waiter, there is a meteorite in my soup! It's glowing!

eat it!!!

waiter, theres an ICBM in my soup with "Property of Danny2462" written on it

I'll just put that in the Lost & Found, thank you.

Waiter, my soup is dry!

Did you add water like the instruction says?

Waiter, my soup is wet. >:-[

Don't worry, I'll just take all the hydrogen out!

Waiter, there's a data centre in my soup!

You did say you wanted a byte of crackers in it, right?

Waiter, I'm in my soup!

Then get out of your soup!

Waiter! There's Danny's planet buster in my soup! And it's about to activate!

Don't worry. It's a bowl of soup, not a planet.

Waiter, my soup is full of stars!

`

Edited January 17, 2021 by LVL 9001

Quick! You have to drink all the soup before it sinks!!!

Waiter! My soup has a bullet hole in it, and is bleeding!

Does anybody know the number for 911?! ('Murica.)

Waiter! A VTOL is trying to land in my soup!

Oh, he just wants a taste.

WAITER! I have several bombs in my soup!

I'm sorry you're absolutely right! let me remove some of them to leave you with just one, just as you ordered.

Waiter, there's a big hairy centipede in my soup. And it uses foul language!
